hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition via DeFi TVL Momentum Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: When total DeFi TVL makes a lower high while ETH price makes a higher high over a 10-day period, and funding rates turn persistently positive (>0.01% daily), the market will transition from NEUTRAL to BEAR within 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Divergence between price (speculative) and TVL (real usage) indicates weak fundamentals beneath price strength. Positive funding shows crowded long positioning. ETH/BTC weakness confirms altcoin vulnerability.
entry_conditions: Total DeFi TVL (USD): 10-day high < previous 10-day high
Aggregate perpetual funding rate > 0.01% for 3 consecutive days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BEAR (confirmed by regime classifier)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: DeFi TVL breaks above its 10-day high

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If conditions trigger but market transitions to BULL instead, or if NEUTRAL regime persists >10 days post-trigger without BEAR transition.
